items.sentence: Tom just wanted to get it over and done with as soon as possible.
When I was thirteen, someone told me I was really good at French.
What do you think Tom will be doing this time tomorrow afternoon?
What kind of things do you do when you and Tom hang out together?
What really surprised me most was how many hours a day Tom slept.
I didn\'t know that I was adopted until I was thirteen years old.
Tom is married to a woman who\'s young enough to be his daughter.
Tom is the only one here who thinks it\'s a good idea to do that.
We still have a long way to go and very little time to get there.
Tom and I haven\'t seen each other since we were in kindergarten.
